PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-05711998-04-020,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
PrecisRules Amending the BANKRUPTCY AND INSOLVENCY RULES that will allow for certain documents to be filed in an electronic format, prescribe the circumstances under which a GST credit payment is exempt from seizure, establish the procedures to follow with respect to the mediation process and the selection of a mediator, specify the procedure to follow in opposing a bankruptcy discharge and who shall pay the court fees involved, raise the threshold on the estimated value of an estate that may be treated as a case for summary administration, from $5,000 to $10,000, and increase the fees payable to a Trustee in a summary administration case and to an Administrator in cases involving a consumer proposal, effective April 30, 1998.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0240 Publication Date: 1998-04-29
